name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As an accomplished Tech Lead with 8 years of experience, I excel in **backend development** and **frontend development**, utilizing a robust technical stack including **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. My proficiency encompasses the entire development lifecycle, backed by a strong foundation in **DevOps** practices and **project coordination**. I am adept at implementing **RBAC**, **ABAC**, and **ReBAC** in projects to enhance security and access control.

I have successfully contributed to high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors by leveraging frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I also possess deep cloud experience with **Azure** and **AWS**, ensuring scalable and compliant applications that meet standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.

In addition to my technical acumen, I bring strong **communication** and **organizational skills**, allowing me to work autonomously and effectively manage system documentation and internal tooling initiatives. Fluent in both **Italian** and **English**, I am dedicated to driving project success while building collaborative team environments.
